text.name: tih_xOffset_long
text.text: Increase this in order to move the overlay to the right, decrease it in order to move to the left.

text.name: tih_yOffset_long
text.text: Increase this in order to move the overlay upwards, decrease it in order to move it downwards.

text.name: tih_displayMode_long
text.text: Switches the inclination indicator between icons and degrees.

text.name: tih_invertArrows_long
text.text: When activated, an upwards arrow means you need to move the tips of your forks up to be level. Otherwise, it means the tips of your forks are currently above the level position.

text.name: tih_colorCoding_long
text.text: When activated, the inclination indicator will be colored when displaying numbers.
